ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitmulcl.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitgrp.2 | |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_unitss | |- U C_ ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_ressbas2 | |- ( U C_ ( Base ` R ) -> U = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- U = ( Base ` G ) |
